versos: (ask) James 4:2 - "You desire but do not have, so you kill. You covet but you cannot get what you want, so you quarrel and fight. You do not have because you do not ask God.";;;
(mingled) Jeremiah 51:9 - We would have healed Babylon
(cease) Psalm 46:10 - "He says, 'Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.'";;;
(solomon) 1 Kings 4:21 - And solomon ruled over all the kingdoms from the Euphrates River to the land of the Philistines
(dross) Proverbs 25:4 - "Take away the dross from the silver, and a smith has material for a vessel;";;;
(wine) Ephesians 5:18 - "Do not get drunk on wine, which leads to debauchery. Instead, be filled with the Spirit,";;;
(offended) Matthew 11:6 - "And blessed is the one who is not offended by Me.";;;
(nurse) 1 Thessalonians 2:7 - "but we were gentle among you, like a nursing mother taking care of her own children.";;;
(breast) Proverbs 5:19 - "A loving doe, a graceful deer may her breasts satisfy you always, may you ever be intoxicated with her love.";;;
(wind) Ecclesiastes 11:5 - "As you do not know the path of the wind, or how the body is formed in a mothers womb, so you cannot understand the work of God, the Maker of all things.";;;
(proved) Genesis 22:1 - "Sometime later God tested Abraham. He said to him, Abraham Here I am, he replied.";;;
(handle) 2 Timothy 2:15 - Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved
(mock) Proverbs 14:9 - "Fools mock at making amends for sin, but goodwill is found among the upright.";;;
(workmen) 1 Chronicles 22:15 - "There are many workmen with you: stonecutters, masons, carpenters, and all kinds of skilled craftsmen for every kind of work.";;;
(weak) Romans 14:1 - "Accept the one whose faith is weak, without quarreling over disputable matters.";;;
(heaps) Romans 12:20 - Therefore "If your enemy is hungry, feed him; If he is thirsty, give him a drink; For in so doing you will heap coals of fire on his head.";;;
(dust) Genesis 3:19 - "By the sweat of your brow you will eat your food until you return to the ground, since from it you were taken; for dust you are and to dust you will return.";;;
